Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
The SUSE Linux Enterprise 15 SP2 kernel was updated to receive various security and bugfixes.

The following security bug was fixed:

- CVE-2020-14386: Fixed a potential local privilege escalation via memory corruption (bsc#1176069).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel before 5.9-rc4. Memory corruption can be exploited to gain root privileges from unprivileged processes. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.
